title: AI Companions (AIC) Price Hits $0.11 on Major Exchanges
description: AI Companions (AIC) traded 4.5% higher against the US dollar during the twenty-four hour period ending at 10:00 AM Eastern on December 7th. AI Companions has a total market capitalization of $108.69 million and approximately $4.00 million worth of AI Companions was traded on exchanges in the last day. title: Delhi launches India’s first city-centric AI innovation movement to prepare students
description: Chief Minister Rekha Gupta said that when the Centre decided that India must take decisive steps in the direction of AI, Delhi resolved to lead from the front.
